::: {.Exercise data-latex=""}

Pour chaque réaction et selon la définition de Brønsted-Lowry, déterminez l'acide, la base, l'acide conjugué et la base conjuguée. 

a. $\ce{H2CO3_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> H3O^+_{(aq)} + HCO3^{-}_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
b. $\ce{C5H5N_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> OH^{-}_{(aq)} + C5H5NH^+_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
c. $\ce{CH3NH2_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> CH3NH3^+_{(aq)} + OH^{-}_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
d. $\ce{HBr_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> H3O^+_{(aq)} + Br^{-}_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}

:::

::: {.Answer data-latex=""}

a. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{H2CO3_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{H3O^+_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{HCO3^{-}_{(aq)}}}$} $$
b. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{C5H5N_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{OH^{-}_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{C5H5NH^+_{(aq)}}}$} $$
c. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{CH3NH2_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{CH3NH3^+_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{OH^{-}_{(aq)}}}$} $$
d. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{HBr_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{H3O^+_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{Br^{-}_{(aq)}}}$} $$

:::
